DOC.brief_summary: The overall goal study explore colorectal cancer patient ' concern interest health behavior change post treatment . Investigators conduct formative research , include qualitative interview , assess issue cancer survivor willing work transition active treatment . The specific aim follow : Aim 1 : Use qualitative interview method describe taxonomy domains health promotion illness prevention behavior change colorectal cancer survivor need new information , skills train support . Aim 2 : Explore colorectal cancer patient ' perception post treatment functional status . Aim 3 : Explore impact cancer , treatment , co-morbidities colorectal cancer patient ' health goal functional status .
DOC.brief_title: Formative Study Tailored Survivor Health Promotion
DOC.detailed_description: Study Procedures : If agree take part study , ask fill questionnaire current health status , social support goal . After complete questionnaire , interview research assistant . The interview audio record . You ask goal health , reach goal , resource would like receive , challenge face since complete treatment . Your name personal identifying information link collected response . All audio tape destroy end study . Length Study : The total time participation study 45 minute . This investigational study . Up 45 patient enrol multicenter study . Up 15 enrol M. D. Anderson .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Patient Stage IIB III colorectal cancer . 2 . Men woman within 1 year end primary treatment colorectal cancer . 3 . Over 18 year age . 4 . Must able read write English . 5 . Must able understand provide write informed consent . 1 ) Patients previous treatment cancer treatment M.D . Anderson , KelseySeybold , VA Medical Center .
